constituent: split, file, bones, one, ceiling, evening, sword, sabre, saber, cloth, clothes, clothing, garment
koohiiStory1: They tried issuing the skeleton warriors with proper garments to wear, but they kept getting split by the sharp bones or by their sabres. In the end, it was decided they look scarier naked anyway.
koohiiStory2: Someone takes a sword made of bone to split the garment right down the middle. Very effective.
myStory: tách. chia. hồ sơ quần áo
readingExamples: 裂く (さ.く), 裂ける (さ.ける)
words:
裂ける(さける): to split, to tear, to burst
破裂(はれつ): explosion, rupture, break off
分裂(ぶんれつ): split, division, break up
裂く(さく): to tear, split
